label: 絵島
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
説明文: (1681-1741) [A] ranking lady official in the service of the shogun's mother [who became famous because of a] scandal [that] occurred in 1714 when a love affair was uncovered betweeen the handsome Ikushima Shingorō (1671-1743), who played love scenes realistically and provocatively," and Ejima (p. 754). [生島新五郎]"
